address: 300 Corporate Pointe, Suite 400, Culver City, CA 90230
subHeading: A Southern California-based law firm committed to outstanding results.
valueProp: GladstoneWeisberg ALC is a Southern California-based law firm committed to consistent delivery of outstanding results. Our attorneys provide litigation, business, insurance and entertainment services to industry professionals on a nationwide basis.

testimonalData.text: Gene is my go to lawyer. He has been there for me and so many of my teammates over the years.
testimonalData.author: Dwight Gooden

testimonalData.text: Gene is a strategic thinker and really knows how to analyze and formulate a litigation game plan.
testimonalData.author: Phil Regan

testimonalData.text: I heard other players saying amazing things about Gene and now I know for myself that it's all true as he never quits until the catch is made!
testimonalData.author: Endy Chavez, NY Mets Player
